name: MultiTokenForwardingRulesManager
description: MultiTokenForwardingRulesManager. Multi token mediator functionality for managing destination AMB lanes permissions.

functionDecorators.name: destinationLane
functionDecorators.description: Tells the destination lane for a particular bridge operation by checking several wildcard forwarding rules.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract on the foreign side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens sender on the home side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens receiver on the foreign side of the bridge.

returnDecorators.description: destination lane identifier, where the message should be forwarded to. 1 - oracle-driven-lane should be used. 0 - default behaviour should be applied. -1 - manual lane should be used.

functionDecorators.name: getModuleInterfacesVersion
functionDecorators.description: Tells the module interface version that this contract supports.

functionDecorators.name: setReceiverExceptionForTokenForwardingRule
functionDecorators.description: Allows a particular address to receive bridged tokens from the manual lane for a particular token. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract on the foreign side.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens receiver on the foreign side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _enable
parameterDecorators.description: true, if bridge operations for a given token and receiver should be forwarded to the manual lane.

functionDecorators.name: setReceiverForwardingRule
functionDecorators.description: Updates the forwarding rule for the specific receiver. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens receiver on the foreign side.

parameterDecorators.name: _enable
parameterDecorators.description: true, if all bridge operations to a given receiver should be forwarded to the oracle-driven lane.

functionDecorators.name: setSenderExceptionForTokenForwardingRule
functionDecorators.description: Allows a particular address to send bridge requests to the manual lane for a particular token. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract on the foreign side.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens sender on the home side of the bridge.

parameterDecorators.name: _enable
parameterDecorators.description: true, if bridge operations for a given token and sender should be forwarded to the manual lane.

functionDecorators.name: setSenderForwardingRule
functionDecorators.description: Updates the forwarding rule for the specific sender. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _sender
parameterDecorators.description: address of the tokens sender on the home side.

parameterDecorators.name: _enable
parameterDecorators.description: true, if all bridge operations from a given sender should be forwarded to the oracle-driven lane.

functionDecorators.name: setTokenForwardingRule
functionDecorators.description: Updates the forwarding rule for bridging specific token. Only owner can call this method.

parameterDecorators.name: _token
parameterDecorators.description: address of the token contract on the foreign side.

parameterDecorators.name: _enable
parameterDecorators.description: true, if bridge operations for a given token should be forwarded to the oracle-driven lane.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Changes the owner of this contract.
